title: [b]Output Filetype[/b]
desc:
File extension to use for rendered images.
[b](Default: jpg)[/b]

title: [b]Save Artist Name[/b]
desc:
Include artist in rendered file name, e.g. Damnation (Seb McKinnon).jpg
[b](Default: True)[/b]

title: [b]Overwrite Duplicates[/b]
desc:
Overwrite rendered files with identical file names.
[b](Default: True)[/b]

title: [b]Language[/b]
desc:
A scryfall supported language code to look for alternate language text.
Phyrexian is not supported at this time.
[b](Default: en)[/b]

title: [b]Enable Flavor Divider[/b]
desc:
Adds flavor divider to rendered card when appropriate.
[b](Default: True)[/b]

title: [b]Remove Flavor Text[/b]
desc:
Renders cards without flavor text.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Remove Reminder Text[/b]
desc:
Renders cards without reminder text.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Realistic Collector Info[/b]
desc:
Disabling this will limit collector info to set code and artist only.
[b](Default: True)[/b]

title: [b]Force English Formatting[/b]
desc:
Enabling this will force Photoshop text layers to use English formatting.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Default Expansion Symbol[/b]
desc:
Symbol character used in lieu of an automatically generated one.
Copy the symbol from here: http://keyrune.andrewgioia.com/cheatsheet.html
[b]This setting must be changed manually.[/b]

title: [b]Automatically Generate Expansion Symbol[/b]
desc:
Generates an accurate looking expansion symbol.
[b](Default: True)[/b]

title: [b]Automatically Position Expansion Symbol[/b]
desc:
Sizes and positions the expansion symbol to fit the type bar.
[b](Default: True)[/b]

title: [b]Expansion Symbol Outline Size[/b]
desc:
Changes the thickness of the expansion symbol outline when not fully automated.
[b](Default: 6)[/b]

title: [b]Fill Expansion Symbol Background[/b]
desc:
Fills empty space in expansion symbol. This feature is mostly deprecated now.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Classic Symbol Rendering[/b]
desc:
Renders expansion symbols using old methodology (pre v1.5.0).
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Manual Editing Mode[/b]
desc:
Pause the render process before saving to allow for manual edits.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Skip Failed Cards[/b]
desc:
Automatically skip failed cards without asking for confirmation.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Scryfall Search Ascending[/b]
desc:
When pulling card from Scryfall, search from oldest to most recent.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Targeted Text Replacement[/b]
desc:
Disabling this can fix a crash that occurs on some versions of Photoshop.
Try disabling this if experiencing a crash during the collector info step.
[b](Default: True)[/b]

title: [b]Development Testing Mode[/b]
desc:
Enabling this will change the GUI into a simple testing interface.
[b]This setting must be changed manually.[/b]

title: [b]Render Snow Cards with Snow Template[/b]
desc:
When enabled, snow cards will be rendered using Snow template type.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Render Miracle Cards with Miracle Template[/b]
desc:
When enabled, miracle cards will be rendered using Miracle template type.
[b](Default: False)[/b]
